com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Class AbstractScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.AbstractScheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultScheduler, UninstallScheduler

    public abstract class AbstractScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract main scheduler class that ties together the main pieces of a SDK Scheduler process. Handles interaction with Mesos via an embedded AbstractScheduler.MesosScheduler object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore 
      protected SchedulerConfig schedulerConfig 
      protected StateStore stateStore 
      protected java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService statusExecutor
      Executor for handling TaskStatus updates in Scheduler#statusUpdate(SchedulerDriver, Protos.TaskStatus).

      Returns a list of API resources to be served by the scheduler to the local cluster.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public AbstractScheduler start()
        Starts any internal threads to be used by the service. Must be called after construction, once, in order for work to proceed.
        Returns:
        this

      • getMesosScheduler

        public java.util.Optional<Scheduler> getMesosScheduler()
        Returns a Mesos API Scheduler object to be registered with Mesos, or an empty Optional if Mesos registration should not be performed.

      • markApiServerStarted

        protected void markApiServerStarted()

      • awaitOffersProcessed

        public void awaitOffersProcessed()
                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        All offers must have been presented to resourceOffers() before calling this. This call will block until all offers have been processed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if waiting for offers to be processed is interrupted
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if offers were not processed in a reasonable amount of time

      • disableApiServer

        public AbstractScheduler disableApiServer()
        Skips the creation of the API server and marks it as "started". In order for this to have any effect, it must be called before start().
        Returns:
        this

      • disableThreading

        public AbstractScheduler disableThreading()
        Forces the Scheduler to run in a synchronous/single-threaded mode for tests. To have any effect, this must be called before calling start().
        Returns:
        this

      • setOfferQueueSize

        public AbstractScheduler setOfferQueueSize(int queueSize)
        Overrides the Scheduler's offer queue size. Must only be called before the scheduler has start()ed.
        Parameters:
        queueSize - the queue size to use, zero for infinite

      • getPlans

        public java.util.Collection<Plan> getPlans()
        Returns the plans defined for this scheduler. Useful for scheduler tests.

      • getResources

        public abstract java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> getResources()
        Returns a list of API resources to be served by the scheduler to the local cluster. This may be called before getPlanCoordinator() has been called.

      • getPlanCoordinator

        protected abstract PlanCoordinator getPlanCoordinator()
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the PlanCoordinator.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • processOffers

        protected abstract void processOffers(java.util.List<Protos.Offer> offers,
                                      java.util.Collection<Step> steps)
        The abstract scheduler will periodically call this method with a list of available offers, which may be empty.

      • processStatusUpdate

        protected abstract void processStatusUpdate(Protos.TaskStatus status)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles a task status update which was received from Mesos. This call is executed on a separate thread which is run by the Mesos Scheduler Driver.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
